claim.claim-text: The system of claim 1, further comprising an authentication server which receives a user authentication request, the user identification information, and identification information of the determined mobile terminal from the image forming apparatus, determines whether the user is authorized, based on the user identification information and the mobile terminal identification information, and transmits a result of the determination to the image forming apparatus.

The system of claim 1 or claim 2, wherein the mobile terminal,
when the mobile terminal is near field communication (NFC)-tagged to the image forming apparatus that supports NFC, receives identification information of the NFC-tagged image forming apparatus necessary for connection with the NFC-tagged image forming apparatus,
sets the connection with the image forming apparatus by using the identification information of the NFC-tagged image forming apparatus, and
transmits the print data based on the connection.

The system of any preceding claim, wherein
the server generates and stores an encryption key for the print data and encrypts the print data by using the encryption key, and
the image forming apparatus transmits print data identification information, user identification information, and mobile terminal identification information together with a request for the encryption key to the server in order to decrypt the encrypted print data, receives the encryption key from the server when the server determines that the request for the encryption key is accepted, and decrypts the encrypted print data by using the encryption key in order to form an image.

The system of any preceding claim, wherein the server sets a point of time when to transmit the print data to the mobile terminal and transmits the print data to the mobile terminal at the set point of time.
The system of any preceding claim, wherein the server renders the print data into a file in a format that is supported by the image forming apparatus, and transmits the file.
The system of any preceding claim, wherein the mobile terminal stores the print data in a security area of the mobile terminal.

The system of any preceding claim, wherein the server includes a mapping table in which the user identification information is mapped with mobile terminal identification information corresponding to the user identification information, and determines the mobile terminal to which the server is to transmit the print data, by referring to the mapping table.

The system of any preceding claim, wherein the mobile terminal and the image forming apparatus both support a role as an access point (AP) for providing connection between clients in a wireless communication environment and a role as one client.
A non-transitory computer-readable recording medium having recorded thereon a computer program, which, when executed by a computer, performs the method of one of claims 1-9.

The printing method of claim 11, wherein
the transmitting of the print data from the mobile terminal to the image forming apparatus further comprises transmitting identification information of the mobile terminal to the image forming apparatus, and
the printing of the print data comprises: transmitting a user authentication request, the user identification information, and the mobile terminal identification information from the image forming apparatus to an authentication server located inside or outside the server; determining whether the user is authorized, based on the user identification information and the mobile terminal identification information; transmitting a result of the determination to the image forming apparatus; and printing the print data when it is determined that the user is authorized.

The printing method of claim 11 or claim 12, wherein the transmitting of the print data from the mobile terminal to the image forming apparatus comprises: when the image forming apparatus that supports NFC is tagged by the mobile terminal, receiving identification information of the image forming apparatus that is necessary for connection with the image forming apparatus, wherein the receiving is performed by the mobile terminal; setting the connection with the image forming apparatus by using the identification information of the image forming apparatus; and transmitting the print data based on the connection.

The printing method of any one of claims 11 to 14, wherein the transmitting of the print data to the determined mobile terminal comprises: setting a point of time when to transmit the print data to the mobile terminal; and transmitting the print data to the mobile terminal at the set point of time.

The printing method of any one of claims 11 to 15, wherein the transmitting of the print data to the determined mobile terminal comprises: rendering the print data into a file in a format supported by the image forming apparatus; and transmitting the rendered file to the mobile terminal.
The printing method of any one of claims 11 to 16, wherein the storing of the print data in the mobile terminal comprises storing the print data in a security area of the mobile terminal.

The printing method of any one of claims 11 to 17, wherein the determining of the mobile terminal of the user to which the server is to transmit the print data comprises determining the mobile terminal of the user to which the server is to transmit the print data, by referring to a mapping table in which the user identification information is mapped with mobile terminal identification information corresponding to the user identification information.

The printing method of any one of claims 11 to 18, wherein the transmitting of the print data from the mobile terminal to the image forming apparatus comprises: displaying a list of the stored print data on a display of the mobile terminal; receiving a selection of the print data which is to form an image, from the user; and transmitting the selected print data to the image forming apparatus.
